Autocomplete.name: options
Autocomplete.description: The options to display in the autocomplete.

Autocomplete.name: aria-label
Autocomplete.description: Accessible label for the autocomplete input.

Autocomplete.name: aria-labelledby
Autocomplete.description: ID of the element that labels this autocomplete.

Autocomplete.name: className
Autocomplete.description: Additional class name for the input element.

Autocomplete.name: color
Autocomplete.description: The color scheme of the autocomplete.

Autocomplete.name: defaultValue
Autocomplete.description:
The uncontrolled input value of the autocomplete when it's initially rendered.

To render a controlled autocomplete, use the `value` prop instead.

Autocomplete.name: emptyMessage
Autocomplete.description: Message to display when no options match the input.

Autocomplete.name: name
Autocomplete.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

Autocomplete.name: placeholder
Autocomplete.description: Placeholder text when no value is entered.

Autocomplete.name: renderOption
Autocomplete.description: Custom render function for option items.

Autocomplete.name: value
Autocomplete.description: The input value of the autocomplete. Use when controlled.

Autocomplete.name: variant
Autocomplete.description: The visual style of the autocomplete input.

Avatar.name: children
Avatar.description: Fallback content (typically initials) displayed when no src is provided or image fails to load.

Avatar.name: color
Avatar.description: The color scheme of the avatar.

Avatar.name: variant
Avatar.description: The visual style of the avatar.

Badge.name: color
Badge.description: The color scheme of the badge.

Badge.name: endDecorator
Badge.description: Element to display after the badge content.

Badge.name: startDecorator
Badge.description: Element to display before the badge content.

Badge.name: variant
Badge.description: The visual style of the badge.

Button.name: color
Button.description: The color scheme of the button.

Button.name: render
variant
Button.description: The visual style of the button.

Checkbox.name: checked
Checkbox.description:
Whether the checkbox is currently ticked.

To render an uncontrolled checkbox, use the `defaultChecked` prop instead.

Checkbox.name: color
Checkbox.description: The color scheme of the checkbox.

Checkbox.name: defaultChecked
Checkbox.description:
Whether the checkbox is initially ticked.

To render a controlled checkbox, use the `checked` prop instead.

Checkbox.name: disabled
Checkbox.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

Checkbox.name: id
Checkbox.description: The id of the input element.

Checkbox.name: name
Checkbox.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

Checkbox.name: value
Checkbox.description: The value of the selected checkbox.

Checkbox.name: variant
Checkbox.description: The visual style of the checkbox.

CheckboxGroup.name: options
CheckboxGroup.description: The options to display as checkboxes.

CheckboxGroup.name: aria-label
CheckboxGroup.description: Accessible label for the checkbox group.

CheckboxGroup.name: aria-labelledby
CheckboxGroup.description: ID of the element that labels this checkbox group.

CheckboxGroup.name: className
CheckboxGroup.description: Additional CSS classes for the root element.

CheckboxGroup.name: color
CheckboxGroup.description: The color scheme of the checkboxes.

CheckboxGroup.name: defaultValue
CheckboxGroup.description:
Names of the checkboxes in the group that should be initially ticked.

To render a controlled checkbox group, use the `value` prop instead.

CheckboxGroup.name: disabled
CheckboxGroup.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

CheckboxGroup.name: orientation
CheckboxGroup.description: The layout orientation of the checkbox group.

CheckboxGroup.name: value
CheckboxGroup.description:
Names of the checkboxes in the group that should be ticked.

To render an uncontrolled checkbox group, use the `defaultValue` prop instead.

CheckboxGroup.name: variant
CheckboxGroup.description: The visual style of the checkboxes.

CodeBlock.name: showCopyButton
CodeBlock.description: Whether to show the copy button

CodeBlock.name: theme
CodeBlock.description: The color theme for syntax highlighting

ColorSchemeToggle.name: color
ColorSchemeToggle.description: The color scheme of the toggle.

ColorSchemeToggle.name: showSystemOption
ColorSchemeToggle.description: Whether to show the system option.

ColorSchemeToggle.name: variant
ColorSchemeToggle.description: The visual style of the toggle.

Combobox.name: options
Combobox.description: The options to display in the combobox.

Combobox.name: aria-label
Combobox.description: Accessible label for the combobox input.

Combobox.name: aria-labelledby
Combobox.description: ID of the element that labels this combobox.

Combobox.name: className
Combobox.description: Additional class name for the input element.

Combobox.name: color
Combobox.description: The color scheme of the combobox.

Combobox.name: defaultValue
Combobox.description:
The uncontrolled selected value of the combobox when it's initially rendered.

To render a controlled combobox, use the `value` prop instead.

Combobox.name: emptyMessage
Combobox.description: Message to display when no options match the input.

Combobox.name: name
Combobox.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

Combobox.name: placeholder
Combobox.description: Placeholder text when no value is entered.

Combobox.name: renderOption
Combobox.description: Custom render function for option items.

Combobox.name: value
Combobox.description: The selected value of the combobox. Use when controlled.

Combobox.name: variant
Combobox.description: The visual style of the combobox input.

Container.name: as
Container.description: The element type to render as.

Container.name: centered
Container.description: Whether to center the container with mx-auto.

Container.name: maxWidth
Container.description: The maximum width of the container.

Separator.name: children
Separator.description: Optional text content to display in the center of the separator.

Separator.name: className
Separator.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

Separator.name: color
Separator.description: The color scheme of the separator.

Separator.name: inset
Separator.description: Adds margin on the ends of the separator.

Field.name: disabled
Field.description:
Whether the component should ignore user interaction.
Takes precedence over the `disabled` prop on the `<Field.Control>` component.

Field.name: name
Field.description:
Identifies the field when a form is submitted.
Takes precedence over the `name` prop on the `<Field.Control>` component.

Grid.name: as
Grid.description: The element type to render as.

Grid.name: columns
Grid.description: Number of columns in the grid.

Input.name: color
Input.description: The color scheme of the input.

Input.name: variant
Input.description: The visual style of the input.

Item.name: render

Link.name: as
Link.description: The element type to render as (for use with router links).

Link.name: color
Link.description: The color scheme of the link.

Link.name: external
Link.description: If true, opens link in new tab with security attributes.

List.name: color
List.description: The color scheme applied to child ListItems.

List.name: marker
List.description:
The marker style for list items.
When set to 'decimal', renders as an ordered list (<ol>).

List.name: size
List.description: The size applied to child ListItems.

List.name: variant
List.description: The visual style applied to child ListItems.

NumberField.name: defaultValue
NumberField.description:
The uncontrolled value of the field when it’s initially rendered.

To render a controlled number field, use the `value` prop instead.

NumberField.name: disabled
NumberField.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

NumberField.name: id
NumberField.description: The id of the input element.

NumberField.name: name
NumberField.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

NumberField.name: size
NumberField.description: The size of the number field.

NumberField.name: value
NumberField.description: The raw numeric value of the field.

Radio.name: value
Radio.description: The unique identifying value of the radio in a group.

Radio.name: color
Radio.description: The color scheme of the radio.

Radio.name: disabled
Radio.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

Radio.name: variant
Radio.description: The visual style of the radio.

RadioGroup.name: options
RadioGroup.description: The options to display as radio buttons.

RadioGroup.name: aria-label
RadioGroup.description: Accessible label for the radio group.

RadioGroup.name: aria-labelledby
RadioGroup.description: ID of the element that labels this radio group.

RadioGroup.name: className
RadioGroup.description: Additional CSS classes for the root element.

RadioGroup.name: color
RadioGroup.description: The color scheme of the radio buttons.

RadioGroup.name: defaultValue
RadioGroup.description:
The uncontrolled value of the radio button that should be initially selected.

To render a controlled radio group, use the `value` prop instead.

RadioGroup.name: disabled
RadioGroup.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

RadioGroup.name: name
RadioGroup.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

RadioGroup.name: orientation
RadioGroup.description: The layout orientation of the radio group.

RadioGroup.name: size
RadioGroup.description: The size of the radio buttons.

RadioGroup.name: value
RadioGroup.description:
The controlled value of the radio item that should be currently selected.

To render an uncontrolled radio group, use the `defaultValue` prop instead.

RadioGroup.name: variant
RadioGroup.description: The visual style of the radio buttons.

Select.name: options
Select.description: The options to display in the select.

Select.name: aria-label
Select.description: Accessible label for the select trigger.

Select.name: aria-labelledby
Select.description: ID of the element that labels this select.

Select.name: className
Select.description: Additional class name for the trigger element.

Select.name: color
Select.description: The color scheme of the select.

Select.name: defaultValue
Select.description:
The uncontrolled value of the select when it’s initially rendered.

To render a controlled select, use the `value` prop instead.

Select.name: name
Select.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

Select.name: placeholder
Select.description: Placeholder text when no value is selected.

Select.name: renderOption
Select.description: Custom render function for option items.

Select.name: value
Select.description: The value of the select. Use when controlled.

Select.name: variant
Select.description: The visual style of the select trigger.

Sheet.name: as
Sheet.description: The element type to render as.

Sheet.name: color
Sheet.description: The color scheme of the sheet.

Sheet.name: focusWithin
Sheet.description:
Use focus-within instead of focus for containers with focusable children.
Only works when interactive is true.

Sheet.name: interactive
Sheet.description:
Whether the sheet is interactive (adds focus ring styling).
Use for clickable cards, buttons, or any focusable element.

Sheet.name: size
Sheet.description: The size of the sheet for context propagation to children.

Sheet.name: variant
Sheet.description: The visual style of the sheet.

Slider.name: aria-labelledby
Slider.description: ID of element that labels the slider.

Slider.name: className
Slider.description: Additional class name for the root element.

Slider.name: color
Slider.description: The color scheme of the slider.

Slider.name: defaultValue
Slider.description:
The uncontrolled value of the slider when it’s initially rendered.

To render a controlled slider, use the `value` prop instead.

Slider.name: disabled
Slider.description: Whether the slider should ignore user interaction.

Slider.name: name
Slider.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

Slider.name: value
Slider.description:
The value of the slider.
For ranged sliders, provide an array with two values.

Slider.name: variant
Slider.description:
The variant style of the slider.
Note: Currently only affects color inheritance from ColorContext.

Stack.name: as
Stack.description: The element type to render as.

Stack.name: separator
Stack.description: Optional separator element to insert between children.

Stack.name: spacing
Stack.description: The spacing between children (maps to gap-0 through gap-12).

Switch.name: aria-labelledby
Switch.description: ID of the element that labels this switch.

Switch.name: checked
Switch.description:
Whether the switch is currently active.

To render an uncontrolled switch, use the `defaultChecked` prop instead.

Switch.name: className
Switch.description: Additional CSS classes for the root element.

Switch.name: color
Switch.description: The color scheme of the switch.

Switch.name: defaultChecked
Switch.description:
Whether the switch is initially active.

To render a controlled switch, use the `checked` prop instead.

Switch.name: disabled
Switch.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

Switch.name: id
Switch.description: The id of the switch element.

Switch.name: name
Switch.description: Identifies the field when a form is submitted.

Table.name: size
Table.description: The size of the table cells.

Textarea.name: color
Textarea.description: The color scheme of the textarea.

Textarea.name: variant
Textarea.description: The visual style of the textarea.

Toggle.name: disabled
Toggle.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

Toggle.name: size
Toggle.description: The size of the toggle button.

Toggle.name: value
Toggle.description:
A unique string that identifies the toggle when used
inside a toggle group.

ToggleGroup.name: defaultValue
ToggleGroup.description:
The open state of the toggle group represented by an array of
the values of all pressed toggle buttons.
This is the uncontrolled counterpart of `value`.

ToggleGroup.name: disabled
ToggleGroup.description: Whether the toggle group should ignore user interaction.

ToggleGroup.name: size
ToggleGroup.description: The size of the toggle group.

ToggleGroup.name: value
ToggleGroup.description:
The open state of the toggle group represented by an array of
the values of all pressed toggle buttons.
This is the controlled counterpart of `defaultValue`.

Tooltip.name: children
Tooltip.description: The element that triggers the tooltip.

Tooltip.name: color
Tooltip.description: The color scheme of the tooltip.

Tooltip.name: popupClassName
Tooltip.description: Additional class name for the popup element.

Tooltip.name: showArrow
Tooltip.description: Whether to show an arrow pointing to the trigger.

Tooltip.name: side
Tooltip.description: The side of the trigger where the tooltip appears.

Tooltip.name: sideOffset
Tooltip.description: The offset in pixels from the trigger.

Tooltip.name: triggerClassName
Tooltip.description: Additional class name for the trigger element.

Tooltip.name: variant
Tooltip.description: The visual style of the tooltip.

Typography.name: color
Typography.description: The color of the text. Use 'inherit' to inherit from parent (default).

Typography.name: level
Typography.description: The typography level determining size, weight, and default element

Typography.name: weight
Typography.description: The font weight (only applies to body levels, headings are always bold)
